text: Hervé Barulea, also known as Baru, (born 29 July 1947) is a French cartoonist. He has Italian heritage. He was known for his debut in the magazine Pilote in 1982. In 2013, he was knighted a Chevalier of the Ordre des Arts et des Lettres.Nomination dans l'ordre des Arts et des Lettres janvier 2013 . Retrieved 29 April 2014 . In 2010, received the Grand Prix de la ville d'Angoulême. == References == Category:1947 births Category:French cartoonists Category:People from Meurthe-et-Moselle Category:Living people
title: Baru (cartoonist)
